about_the_game:
Playing MorDobble is easy. You'll be presented with a set of images. Your task is to find the matching pair before your opponent does. But be quick, because the loser will be subjected to a horrifying heart-breaking curse.

With simple, yet addictive gameplay, intuitive controls, and a visually stunning design, it's sure to be a hit at any gathering. If you enjoy bringing people together and bonding over shared gaming experiences, then MorDobble is a must-have addition to your collection.

Key Features

  • Simple game mechanic - Whoever spots the symbol in common on both set of images claims the first point, then another images' set is revealed for players to search, and so on. Whoever has got the most points when the 30 sets runs out wins! Every set is unique and has only one symbol in common with any other on the screen.
  • An equal chance of winning - MorDobble's gameplay relies on quick reflexes and keen observation skills, rather than on knowledge or strategy, which means that everyone has an equal chance of winning.
  • Solo mode - MorDobble offers the ultimate Player vs Player mode, with Solo mode available for skill sharpening. Plus, after each duel, you'll receive a match statistic report with helpful tips.
  • Multiple Input Methods - The game is designed to offer players the flexibility to choose how they want to play. You can choose to play MorDobble using either a keyboard or a gamepad, depending on your preference.
  • A spooky yet vivid art style - More than 50 "cursed" symbols, skulls, circular saws, and cool hard rock vibes, all designed to add tension to the gameplay. This game will have you questioning your own eyesight and reflexes, leaving you feeling like a fool. But hey, who needs dignity when you can have fun, right?

In this fast-paced and twisted version of Dobble, you'll have to rely on your lightning-fast reflexes and sharp eyesight to survive. It’s always your turn, so do not waste your time. Spot the match or die!

name: MorDobble - Spot The Match

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Dual Core (2.0 GHZ)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

The gameplay relies on quick reflexes and keen observation skills, rather than on knowledge or strategy, which means that everyone has an equal chance of winning.
